Description

  • UVM environment for REGBUS protocol with register model integration

env
uvm_env
env

UVM environment for REGBUS protocol with register model integration

This environment encapsulates the REGBUS agent, register models, and adapter components. It provides the complete testbench infrastructure for REGBUS protocol testing with both traditional and SVDB-based register models.

Inherits: uvm_env

Variables
agent
regbus_agent agent

REGBUS agent instance

This variable holds the REGBUS agent that provides the complete interface for generating and monitoring REGBUS transactions.

ap
uvm_analysis_port#(
regbus_seq_item
) ap

Analysis port for REGBUS sequence items

This variable provides an analysis port that broadcasts REGBUS sequence items collected by the monitor to other components for analysis and checking.

regmodel
register_block regmodel

Traditional register block instance

This variable holds the traditional UVM register block that provides static register model functionality.

reg2regbus
regbus2reg_adapter reg2regbus

REGBUS to register adapter instance

This variable holds the adapter that converts between UVM register operations and REGBUS protocol transactions.

regmodel_svdb
svdb_reg_block regmodel_svdb

SVDB-based register block instance

This variable holds the SVDB-based register block that provides dynamic register model functionality using database integration.

Functions
new
function new(
string 
name,
uvm_component 
parent
)

Constructor for the UVM environment

Parameters
name
string

Name of the environment instance

parent
uvm_component

Parent component in the UVM hierarchy

build_phase
function void build_phase(
uvm_phase 
phase
)

Builds the environment components during the UVM build phase

This function creates the REGBUS agent, register models, and adapter components.  It also configures the register models in the configuration database for global access by sequences.

Parameter
phase
uvm_phase

Current UVM phase

connect_phase
function void connect_phase(
uvm_phase 
phase
)

Connects the environment components during the UVM connect phase

This function connects the monitor's analysis port to the environment's analysis port and sets up the register model sequencer connections with the REGBUS adapter.

Parameter
phase
uvm_phase

Current UVM phase
